resources.string: Whodou provides one place to manage all of your customer communication and helps you grow your business by connecting you with your existing customers friends and family.\n\nIts east and free!
Easily add your customer with click of a few buttons and start streamlining your business.
Accelerate the growth of your business by automating word-of-mouth referrals between your existing customers and their friends and family.
Communicate with customers via live chat, request and receive mobile payment for your services, and manage appointments from your existing calendar.
